Member Function Documentation

  function void
 svt_i2c_master_callback::new
 (  string name = "svt_i2c_master_callback"  ) 

CONSTRUCTOR: Create a new transactor callback instance, passing the appropriate argument values to the svt_xactor_callbacks parent class.

name - Identifies the callback instance.

 Superseded functions 
 uvm_object :: new 
 uvm_callback :: new 

 virtual function void
 svt_i2c_master_callback::post_seq_item_get
 (  svt_i2c_master driver , svt_i2c_master_transaction xact , ref bit drop  ) 

Callback issued after pulling a transaction descriptor out of its input TLM port, but before acting on the transaction descriptor in any way.

driver - A reference to the component object issuing this callback. User's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the transactor.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.
